Potential labor relations issues in non-union plants

social_issues: Maintaining positive labor relations, particularly in non-union plants

sources.title: Armstrong World Industries - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Armstrong World Industries, Inc. is a Pennsylvania corporation incorporated in 1891. [2] It is an international designer and manufacturer of wall and ceiling building materials.
